text: Major: Aerospace Engineering | Minor: Mechanical Engineering

tables: Swami Vivekananda Lotus Valley Public School

bullets: Achieved the Overall Winner title nationwide in Class-I Electric Vehicle category at Formula Bharat 2023
Secured All India Rank 3578 in JEE Advanced 2021 among the 1.5 Lakh shortlisted candidates
State Topper (Top 1%) in Indian Olympiad Qualifier in Astronomy 2020-2021 Part I (XII level) examination

tables: • Simulate and analyze the wake of helicopter blades using Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD)

•  Validated CFD simulations using NASA’s 1981 Caradonna and Tung NACA0012 twin-blade hover data •  Improved simulation convergence by testing pseudo-transient time scales factors of 0.01, 0.1, 5, and 10 •  Developed main rotor mesh with 20M elements in Pointwise, ensuring area ratio ≤0.4 and skewness ≤0.9 •  Applied periodic boundary conditions to simulate 1/5 th  of the domain, reducing computational expense

•  Achieved residuals below 1e-4 using a time scale factor of 10 on the NACA0012 twin-blade geometry •  Validated CFD simulations by achieving pressure coefficient (Cp) plots within a 5-10% error margin •  Displayed vortex trajectory plots within a 3-5% error range up to 200 °  vortex age on NACA0012 geometry

bullets: Applied Modern Portfolio Theory to comprehensively assess risk and return for a sample of Indian stocks using Python
Analyzed extensive historical stock data to assess returns, risks, and guide informed investment decisions effectively
Constructed a diversified portfolio on Efficient Frontier, optimizing stock weights to maximize the Sharpe ratio effectively
Determined optimal stock allocations to maximize potential returns for a given risk level, ensuring a balanced portfolio
Measured risk and reward using metrics like Sortino Ratio (1.7), Treynor's Ratio (9.2), CAGR (21%), and Beta (0.76)
Predicted the stock data using sequential data modeling algorithms like RNN , LSTM , GRU, and Transformers
Leveraged the strengths of each algorithm to enhance the robustness of the model for time series forecasting
Integrated time embedding technique using the Time2Vec to understand temporal patterns in stock market data
Achieved a mean squared error of 0.0021 on a test dataset and extended the model to predict stock prices for multiple days
Analyzed 70 years of race data, driver statistics and 5 years of weather data to predict Formula 1 outcomes using Pandas
Applied data preprocessing techniques, such as handling missing values, feature scaling, and one-hot encoding
Conducted EDA with 20+ visualizations using Matplotlib and Plotly to identify key trends, distributions and correlations
Developed predictive models using Random Forest and XGBoost with scikit-learn, focusing on optimizing model accuracy
Successfully predicted race outcomes with R 2 of 0.85, validating model effectiveness on large-scale sports datasets
Programming Languages: C, C++, MATLAB, Python, SQL, LATEX
Softwares & Libraries: Numpy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn, OpenCV, TensorFlow, Tableau, Power BI

tables: •  Led a 3-tier team of 60+ team members to work towards design, manufacturing and testing of FSEV •  Led brainstorming sessions to improve functioning of the team on both individual and group levels

•  Developed and implemented a timeline, managing workflows across 9 subsystems to meet team targets •  Ensured the timely completion and submission of various technical documents for FB 2024 2 •  Led the manufacturing and design workflows concurrently to enhance the onboarding of new recruits

•  Developed and launced institute’s inaugural Formula Student Electric Vehicle within a 9-month timeline •  Secured sponsorship of over INR 48 lakhs, an increase of approximately 220% from the previous season
Mathematical Engg. and Physics using Machine Learning*
Computational Fluid Dynamics and Heat Transfer*
